name: Buddhist Train
overview:
Discover top Buddhist pilgrimage destinations in India by Buddhist train tour or Buddhist circuit special train tour. We offers customized Buddhist tour packages for different Buddhist places in India. We cover major Buddhist places like Lumbini, Bodhgaya, Sarnath, Kushinagar, nalanda, Rajgir, Varanasi, Aurangabad etc. Some of the famous Buddhist tours are The Buddhas Journeys, Buddha in Caves, Buddhist Temple Tour, Footsteps of Buddha, The Buddha Trailâ€™s, Buddhist monasteries tours etc.

Top Travel & Tours Pvt. Ltd. has grown into a pioneering Buddhist tour operating company for providing Buddhist pilgrimage tour in India and its sub-continent. We offer comprehensive tour packages and elaborate tours where in you can visit all the major Buddhist pilgrimage destinations and sites not only of India and Nepal but also Sri-Lanka, Myanmar and Tibet as well because these countries have equal significance and there are many sites which are worth paying a visit to.

Top Travel & Tours Pvt. Ltd. attracts the devotees around the world and the religious sites of those times have still become the places of monumental importance. We get the business from China, Japan, Korea, Thailand, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Sri-Lanka, Myanmar, Indonesia, Vietnam, Cambodia, Taiwan and several Buddhist communities, temples and monasteries of USA, UK, Australia, France, Canada and Germany always rely on our personalized and efficient services. Visit: http://www.buddhisttrain.com/
